Class ObjectStorage_Http_Abstract

(line 8)

Description




	Located in File: /lib/ObjectStorage/Http/Abstract.php





ObjectStorage_Http_Abstract is the base class of a HTTP request and response classes.


    
		
  • copyright: - Copyright (c) 2012 SoftLayer Technologies Inc. (http://www.softlayer.com)
    • 
	



Classes extended from ObjectStorage_Http_Abstract:
 		

	
ObjectStorage_Http_Response

		
ObjectStorage_Http_Response contains a HTTP response data.

	

		

	
ObjectStorage_Http_Request

		
ObjectStorage_Http_Request contains a HTTP request data.
